item.title: Are You Making This Common Spelling Mistake with Fettuccine?
item.description: Introduction to Making a Common Spelling Mistake with Fettuccine Fettuccine is a type of pasta that is made from long, flat ribbons of dough. It is a staple of Italian cuisine, and is often served with a variety of sauces. Unfortunately, many people make a common spelling mistake when writing the word “fettuccine”. What is the Common Spelling Mistake with Fettuccine? The common spelling mistake is to write “fettucine” instead of “fettuccine”.
